lenders.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world

lenders.occupational_info: We at Johnson Creek Smoke Juice make the very best juice for all electronic smoking devices, a promising alternative to cigarettes that contains 7 components compared to the 4000 of a regular cigarette.

lenders.occupational_info: Laborous. But happy to have my health to be able to do it.

lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.

lenders.name: sue

lenders.name: Andrés
lenders.loan_because: I feel sympathy for my fellow human beings.  We only have each other in this world, so we should do all we can to make each other's lives better.

lenders.name: William
lenders.occupation: U.S. Coast Guard Helicopter Rescue Swimmer
lenders.loan_because: I don't get paid a lot and know what it feels like to not live an upper-class life.  Doing this makes my soul feel a little richer.
lenders.occupational_info: I jump out of helicopters to save people that are drowning.  I also provide medical assistance to boaters and rescue people stranded inland.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I'm incredibly lucky and have had many opportunities, so it's my responsibility to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to college in the northeast and am currently studying Political Science and Philosophy.

lenders.name: Miss
lenders.loan_because:
instead of giving someone in need a fish for a day, or even teaching them how to fish...first they need to have a net to cast upon the waters. 

I learned in a cultural geography course at college that microlending was one of the best ways that women were able to lift themselves out of dire poverty, and make a huge impact on bettering their lives. 

I'm a business woman myself, and I'm happy to do what I can to assist women throughout the world in becoming independent and self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
I perform sexual services over the telephone. Women performing sexual services (even legally) for money is a VERY taboo thing in most areas of the world. I am extremely fortunate to live in a society, which while it does not embrace such work, allows it legally. I am also fortunate to live in a society where I run my own business doing so, and am not exploited. 

I enjoy my work, and it is a job that I *choose* to do. It is not a job everyone would choose to do, but I contribute here to give women the same choices I have on what work they wish to do.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: Just because I can't get credit doesn't mean others should be stopped in their tracks by that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people figure out how to fix their home and sell them the tools to do so.

lenders.name: Laura Roberts
lenders.loan_because: Even though writers aren't the wealthiest people in the world, it's important to give back. While I'm making my dreams come true, I'm also helping others to achieve dreams of their own. I love that Kiva gives average people like me the ability to really help others in a direct and meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a micro-press writing and publishing humorous ebooks, haiku and ninja novellas. I also run a kick-ass online literary magazine, Black Heart (http://blackheartmagazine.com).

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: people have always been generous to me all along the way....

lenders.name: T.R. Khadija

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the local university, specializing in Latin American History, Religious Studies, and Spanish.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am encouraged by providing people the resources and tools to help themselves. Life presents us every day with a choice. The choice to give or the choice  to recieve. Today I choose to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Independent Consultant with Arbonne International. I work from home, selling botanically based natural skin care, and help other women start there home based businesses as well. It is an amazing opportunity for freedom and CHOICE, which enables me to GIVE in return.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about technical products and services, helping people to understand the value of my company's products and services.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I and my wife want to start a chicken rearing business .The income i get from working freelance isn't enough to pay school fees for 2 kids and feed a family of 5, let alone pay bills.we are confident after a year in this project, things will change.
lenders.occupational_info: Am a freelance at my work, at the moment it is on and off  and unreliable.

lenders.name: Espen
lenders.loan_because: I hope that my contribution will make a difference!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I love my fellow human beings.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software. When I'm not writing software, I draw comics.

lenders.name: Peter

lenders.name: Brenden family

lenders.occupational_info: We work to improve human capital and software solutions.

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is a human responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than us.

lenders.name: ISL Mi-Fi Fund
lenders.loan_because:
We are a fund run by students from the International School of Lausanne, Switzerland.  We collect loans from fellow students, teachers, and parents in our community to make loans to people across the world, embodying our international spirit.

We want to loan to those less fortunate than ourselves. We believe the world should help those who put their hands out asking for a helping hand, not just a hand out. We admire those who seek to improve their standing in life by working hard and want to help them reach their goal. The satisfaction of knowing one is helping  is reward enough and although micro-finance is not the solution to world poverty it is certainly a huge leap forwards.
lenders.occupational_info: The ISL MI-FI Fund was set up and is run by students from the International School of Lausanne.  Our goal is to teach our community about micro financing and how our loans can help small entrepreneurs around the world.  We gather loans from students, teachers and parents in our community and reach entrepreneurs around the world through Kiva.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: „If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself and make a change.“

lenders.name: Gali
lenders.loan_because: The world is not a fair place.

lenders.name: Walt
lenders.loan_because: I served in Vietnam with the United States Army in 1971-1972.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the airline industry!

lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school in an upper middle class suburban community. I teach sixth grade art to about 120 students a day. I get a new group every 6 weeks. I love my job! I also create my own artwork.

lenders.name: Jeremy & Bethany

lenders.name: affinity
lenders.loan_because: Our team believes that ambition coupled with compassion can evolve us toward a better world. We loan because: we are inspired by people and their stories and we would like to give them the opportunity to fulfill their entrepreneurial dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: The affinity group is an investment & consulting group specialized in MSE's. The groups aim is to pursue sustainable investment ideas and  implement them successfully.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: My parents taught me to help people who have fewer resources than I have.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe in One World.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired!!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: My grandmother loaned me a small amount of money to start my own business. I worked hard and my business has flourished. Now I want to pass that success along to others who are willing to work for a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in advertising. I create ads, brochures, flyers and tv & radio commercial to help my clients' businesses flourish. 

I love to explore the far corners of the world and have made loans in areas that I have visited in my travels.

lenders.name: Oana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of masses. I believe that if each of us helped  out at least one other person on the planet, we'd make the world a better place. I'm also fed up seeing people waiting for help to come from some official authority and ending up disappointed :(

lenders.name: Jourdan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy and it's the right thing to do. Everyone wants to create a better life for their family and give their children opportunities that they did not have growing up. Social lending is a perfect way to give others this much needed chance.
lenders.occupational_info: We strive to empower and creatively inspire individuals to contribute to our local and global communities.

lenders.loan_because: Most of us have got way too much in the developed countries and it's easy to forget how little others have and as a Christian, I want to do more.
lenders.occupational_info: Very little indeed in the grand scheme of things, but every little helps.
